ygData.subject: [eqbard]  New song
ygData.msgSnippet: How about a song that gives a standard D&D bard ability.  The make money song.  Before the torrid flames come roaring in, hear me out. First, it makes sense,
ygData.messageBody:
How about a song that gives a standard D&D bard ability. The make money
song. Before the torrid flames come roaring in, hear me out.

First, it makes sense, we sing a little song, people pay to hear it.
This is a normal thing. I find if odd that bards have no real ability
that PC's will pay for (like most casters do).

Make it a long recycle time, like beg. It needs to be resung (so you
cant leave it on all night).

The money you make (like most of our songs) is based on CHA/faction and
level.

It makes sense, would help out and could lead to some better stuff.
If they decide to make a defining bard quest (liek soulfire for the
paladin), perhaps a drum that is a decent 1HB weapon (Tom Toms of
Terror), then the quest could be kicked off by performing the Money Song
for a certain NPC.

Another cool thing would be to give us a cool animation for this, thus
maybe even some PC's with money to waste will pay to see it :)
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
